thread.title: Watch Hugh Jackman Shred the Wolverine Diet to Smithereens
thread.title_full: Watch Hugh Jackman Shred the Wolverine Diet to Smithereens

author: Greg Morabito
title: Watch Hugh Jackman Shred the Wolverine Diet to Smithereens
text: Watch Hugh Jackman Shred the Wolverine Diet to Smithereens Jimmy Fallon & Mario Batali surprise the actor with pasta and wine share For the past 17 years, Hugh Jackman has played Wolverine in the X-Men movies, which means that for nearly two decades, the actor has had to stay on a strict diet — his character is often shirtless and slashing his way out of difficult situations, so no dad bods were allowed on set. But now, with the release of Logan , Jackman is finally putting Wolverine (and the Wolverine diet) to bed. Jimmy Fallon , always the considerate soul, wanted to celebrate the end of Jackman’s X-Men fasting during the actor’s Tonight Show appearance last Friday. And so, toward the end of their segment, the late-night host summoned his buddy Mario Batali from backstage, who surprised Jackman with a gigantic bowl of pasta and a hearty pour of wine. This clip captures the pure joy of kicking your diet to the curb and diving head-first into a pile of delicious carbohydrates.
